name: Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones
name_original: Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones
description: Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones is an RPG game for the Gameboy/Gameboy Color, where the Wooden Knight must find the 6 Stones of the Light Region before the Ancient Evil can. Along the way, the Wooden Knight meets several characters that range from a person who travels across Light Island, to the leader of an evil group. Will the Wooden Knight get all 6 Stones and save Earth like the Hero of the Past?
